# Pull Request

## Description
Brief description of changes.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change fixing an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change adding functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature causing existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code quality improvement

## Related Issue
Closes #(issue number)

## Changes Made
- Change 1
- Change 2
- Change 3

## Testing
- [ ] Tested with new project setup
- [ ] Tested with existing project
- [ ] Tested across multiple stacks (Python, Node, Go)
- [ ] All slash commands still work
- [ ] Setup wizard works correctly

## Checklist
- [ ] Code follows toolkit style
- [ ] Self-reviewed my code
- [ ] Commented code where needed
- [ ] Updated documentation (README, TOOLKIT-OVERVIEW, etc.)
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] No breaking changes (or documented if breaking)
- [ ] Templates validate correctly

## Screenshots (if applicable)
Add screenshots showing the feature/fix in action.

## Additional Notes
Any other information reviewers should know.
